WorkItem.Description:
On trunk 47178 the following unit tests are broken: 

- EditAction_Retrieves_Dinner_1_From_Repo_And_Countries_And_Sets_DinnerViewModel
- EditAction_Saves_Changes_To_Dinner_1
- LoginPostRedirectsToReturnUrlIfLoginSuccessfulAndReturnUrlGiven
- EditAction_Uses_DinnerFormViewModel
- IndexAction_With_Search_Term_Should_Filter
- CreateAction_With_New_Dinner_Should_Return_View_And_Repo_Should_Contain_New_Dinner

Built using VS2010 on 32 bit Windows 7 Pro

Comments.Message: Thanks - I fixed all but 4 of these with the latest checkin, working on those last 4.
All unit tests are fixed in the latest checkins.
